Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: LuckbethisLady
Reviews.Content: moved hotel original hotel borromeo review didnt weekend hadnt booked advance borromeo aspect wasnt bad yes dingy walls crumbling clean doesnt smell theres ac bit june heat windows wasnt unbearable switched arrival shared terrace worth sunrise breathtaking balcony perfect start day beautiful rome hotel located 5 min street vatican 10 min spanish steps pretty base exploring historic option season booked pricey theres definitely similar prices
